name: golden_dataset_v1
description: Golden evaluation dataset for ACME Corporation RAG system with questions covering policies, earnings, customer analytics, and products

records.question: What was ACME's total revenue in Q2 2025?
records.expected_answer: ACME's total revenue in Q2 2025 was $923 million, representing a 26% year-over-year increase.

records.question: How many new customers did ACME add in Q3 2025?
records.expected_answer: ACME added 2,389 new customers in Q3 2025.

records.question: What was the gross margin percentage in Q2 2025?
records.expected_answer: The gross margin in Q2 2025 was 65%, improved from 62% in Q2 2024.

records.question: What was the Annual Recurring Revenue (ARR) in Q3 2025?
records.expected_answer: The Annual Recurring Revenue (ARR) was $2.03 billion, up 32% year-over-year.

records.question: How many total active customers did ACME have as of December 31, 2025?
records.expected_answer: ACME had 30,820 total active customers as of December 31, 2025, representing 35% growth year-over-year.

records.question: What percentage of ACME's customer base is located in North America?
records.expected_answer: North America represents 58% of ACME's customer base with 17,875 customers.

records.question: What is the average contract value for enterprise segment customers?
records.expected_answer: The average contract value (ACV) for enterprise segment customers (>$100K annual) is $653,400.

records.question: What was ACME's logo retention rate in 2025?
records.expected_answer: ACME's logo retention rate was 93%, having lost 1,289 of 22,842 customers from the start of 2025.

records.question: What is the net revenue retention rate for ACME?
records.expected_answer: The net revenue retention rate is 126%, including expansion, upsell, and cross-sell.

records.question: What was the primary reason for customer churn in 2025?
records.expected_answer: The primary churn reason was budget constraints, accounting for 38% of churned customers.

records.question: Who is responsible for overall privacy program at ACME?
records.expected_answer: The Chief Privacy Officer (CPO) has overall responsibility for the privacy program, advises leadership on privacy risks, approves policies, and reports to the Board.

records.question: What privacy regulations does ACME comply with according to the data privacy policy?
records.expected_answer: ACME complies with GDPR, CCPA, HIPAA, SOC 2, ISO 27001, and industry-specific requirements.

records.question: How many days per week minimum are required for office presence in the hybrid work arrangement?
records.expected_answer: The hybrid arrangement requires a minimum of 2 days per week in the office, typically Tuesday-Thursday for team collaboration.

records.question: What is the minimum internet speed requirement for remote work at ACME?
records.expected_answer: Remote workers must have reliable high-speed internet with minimum 25 Mbps download and 5 Mbps upload.

records.question: What approval level is required for fully remote location-independent work arrangements?
records.expected_answer: Fully remote location-independent arrangements require SVP approval and are limited to 20% of any team.

records.question: What is the pricing for the Professional Plan of CloudAnalytics?
records.expected_answer: The Professional Plan costs $15,000 per month and includes up to 50 users, 2 TB of data storage, all connectors, advanced visualizations, AI-powered insights, and priority support with a 4-hour SLA.

records.question: What is the free trial duration for CloudAnalytics?
records.expected_answer: CloudAnalytics offers a 14-day free trial of the Professional Plan with no credit card required.

records.question: What is the uptime SLA for the Enterprise plan?
records.expected_answer: The Enterprise plan offers 99.9% uptime SLA with financial credits for violations.

records.question: What is the maximum hotel rate allowed for international travel?
records.expected_answer: The maximum hotel rate for international travel is $300 per night.

records.question: How many characters must passwords be at minimum according to the security policy?
records.expected_answer: Passwords must be at minimum 12 characters long.
